faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to your questions

q1.question: How can I book a tour?
q1.answer: To book a tour, select your desired tour on our website, fill out the booking form, and pay online or contact us at [email protected] or call +995 596 55 00 99.

q2.question: Can I cancel my booking?
q2.answer: Yes, cancellations are possible up to 48 hours before the tour starts with a full refund. Cancellations within 48 hours are non-refundable.

q3.question: How far in advance should I book?
q3.answer: We recommend booking at least 7 days in advance. During peak season (May-September), booking 2-3 weeks ahead is preferable.

q4.question: What happens in case of bad weather?
q4.answer: In case of extreme weather conditions (heavy rain, snow, dangerous conditions), we can reschedule your tour or provide a full refund.

q1.question: What's included in the tour price?
q1.answer: Tour price includes: transportation, professional guide, entrance tickets to attractions, and insurance. Food and personal expenses are not included unless specified.

q2.question: In what languages are tours conducted?
q2.answer: Our tours are conducted in Georgian, English, and Russian. Other languages can be requested with advance notice.

q3.question: Are tours suitable for children?
q3.answer: Many of our tours are family-friendly. However, some trekking and adventure tours are recommended for ages 12+. Contact us for details.

q4.question: Can I request a private custom tour?
q4.answer: Yes! We offer fully customized private tours tailored to your preferences, budget, and schedule. Contact us to create your perfect itinerary.

q1.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q1.answer: We accept: credit/debit cards (Visa, Mastercard), bank transfers, and cash at our office. For international payments, we use secure online payment systems.

q2.question: Can I pay in installments?
q2.answer: Yes, you can pay 50% at booking and the remaining 50% up to 3 days before the tour starts.

q3.question: Are there group discounts?
q3.answer: Yes! We offer 10% discount for groups of 6+ people and 15% for groups of 10+. Student and children discounts also available.

q1.question: Do I need a visa to visit Georgia?
q1.answer: Citizens of 90+ countries can enter Georgia visa-free for up to 1 year. Check visa requirements for your country with the Georgian embassy.

q2.question: What's the best season to visit Georgia?
q2.answer: May-October is ideal for mountains and nature. Winter (December-March) is perfect for ski resorts. Spring and autumn are great for wine tours.

q3.question: What currency do I need?
q3.answer: Georgia's official currency is the Lari (GEL). You can exchange money at airports, banks, or exchange offices. Many places accept international cards.

q4.question: Is it safe to travel in Georgia?
q4.answer: Yes! Georgia is considered a safe country for tourists. Our team ensures all safety standards during tours. Travel insurance is recommended.
